page.title: 17Family Recreation,P.G.,Stev.
page.content: My family has many hobbies.My dad likes woodwork and gardening and he also likes to read.My mum likes to cook,sew,knit,and garden.My sister likes to dance,swim,read and she attends Brownies.I like to dance,swim, read,write and play musical instruments.As a family we visit places such as{Public Gardens,Parks, {Country Houses}and{Museums.}We like to visit other countries and we have been to{France,Germany,Holland and Belgium. We have friends in Ascot and relatives in{Leicester,Blackpool}and{Yorkshire. We visit friends in{Holland}and {France}and we have relatives in {Germany and Australia.}We play many games within the family,including chess,draughts,tennis and badminton.We also watch a lot of television and listen to the radio.
